title: 1992년 United States v. Curtis Fitzgerald Harding 사건
summary: 미국 USA, Federal 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: United States v. Curtis Fitzgerald Harding. 판결일: 1992-08-03. 법원: Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Curtis Fitzgerald HARDING, Defendant-Appellant
**판결일**: 1992-08-03
**법원**: Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit
**관할**: USA, Federal

**판사**: Farris, Fernandez, Wiggins

## 변호인

David S. McLane, Deputy Federal Public Defender, Los Angeles, Cal, for defendant-appellant., Peter G. Spivack, Asst. U.S. Atty., Los Angeles, Cal., for plaintiff-appellee.

## 인용

- 971 F.2d 410

## 판결문 요약

971 F.2d 410
    UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee,v.Curtis Fitzgerald HARDING, Defendant-Appellant.
    No. 91-50423.
    United States Court of Appeals,Ninth Circuit.
    Submitted July 10, 1992.*Decided Aug. 3, 1992.
    
      David S. McLane, Deputy Federal Public Defender, Los Angeles, Cal., for defendant-appellant.
      Peter G. Spivack, Asst. U.S. Atty., Los Angeles, Cal., for plaintiff-appellee.
      Appeal from the United States District Court for the Central District of California.
      Before:  FARRIS, WIGGINS, and FERNANDEZ, Circuit Judges.
      WIGGINS, Circuit Judge:
    
    OVERVIEW
    
      1
      Curtis Fitzgerald Harding appeals his sentence of 120 months under the Sentencing Guidelines for possession with the intent to distribute cocaine base.   He argues that the distinction made in the United States Sentencing Guidelines between cocaine base (crack) and cocaine hydrochloride (powder cocaine) violates the Equal Protection Clause of the United States Constitution.   The District Court had jurisdiction over this case pursuant to 18 U.S.C. § 3231.   This court has jurisdiction over the timely appeal pursuant to 28 U.S.C. § 1291.   We affirm.
    
    BACKGROUND
    
      2
      On February 11, 1991, Harding pled guilty to possession with intent to distribute 89.1 grams of cocaine base, in violation of 21 U.S.C. § 841(a)(1).   In return for his plea, the government agreed to dismiss indictments for the possession with inten...
